Bury St Edmunds Mobile Library Route 3

Contact us:

Managers: Carl Bell and Kevin Lambert

Email: help@suffolklibraries.co.uk

Telephone: 01473 351249

Route timetable

Stop Village Location Time
3A Stanton Bury Road 0920 – 0935
3B Stanton Stanton Stores 0940 – 1000
3C Stanton Hilltop 1005 – 1025
3D Barningham Royal George Car Park 1030 – 1120
3E Coney Weston The Swan 1125 – 1140
3F Coney Weston The Drift 1145 – 1200
3G Market Weston Village Hall 1205 – 1220
3G2 Hopton Walnut Close 1225 – 1235
3H Hopton Nethergate Street 1240 – 1255
3J Hopton Holme Close 1300 – 1335
3K Thelnetham White Horse 1435 – 1450
3L Hinderclay Village Hall 1455 – 1515
3M Hepworth Ivy Nook, Beck Street 1525 – 1540
3N Hepworth Half Moon 1545 – 1605

Calling every 4 weeks on Thursdays:

2019: 10 January, 7 February, 7 March, 4 April, 2 May, 30 May, 27 June, 25 July, 22 August, 19 September, 17 October, 14 November, 12 December
